channel.title: Compiler or server Giving you error?
channel.description:
Ok here is how to fix the "Path not specified" Error
Open the Source File and Open Either the Compiler or the runserv.exe that is not working. Next Right click the file and press edit. Once in the file Press Ctrl+F and search C: Or just look down until you see C: After look for that if your on xp change it to E: and look further down the line until you see JDK.1.0.6.X Change the last number(Represented by the X) To your JDK version, At the moment it is 22. Save the file and your all good, Hope this works. :D If it doesn't work PM me at my email, Which can be found on my profile.
-Madeinpoland

item.title: Compiler or server Giving you error?
item.dc:creator: @madeinpoland madeinpoland
item.description:
@madeinpoland wrote:

Ok here is how to fix the “Path not specified” Error

Open the Source File and Open Either the Compiler or the runserv.exe that is not working.
Next Right click the file and press edit. Once in the file Press Ctrl+F and search C:
Or just look down until you see C:
After look for that if your on xp change it to E: and look further down the line until you see JDK.1.0.6.X Change the last number(Represented by the X) To your JDK version, At the moment it is 22.
Save the file and your all good, Hope this works.
If it doesn’t work PM me at my email, Which can be found on my profile.

-Madeinpoland
